alert.note: Alert for Gasconade (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 15 at 5:47PM CDT until April 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Missouri, including the following counties, Franklin and Gasconade. * WHEN...Until 900 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 547 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sullivan, Owensville, Gerald, Bland, Rosebud, Drake, Beaufort, Mount Sterling, Leslie, Japan, Canaan, Noser Mill and Bay.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
